mapper.update: update pltf_sap_conn_resource set type=#{type}, name=#{name}, description=#{description}, app_server=#{appServer}, instance_no=#{instanceNo}, system_id=#{systemId}, router_string=#{routerString}, msg_server=#{msgServer}, router=#{router}, grp_server=#{grpServer}, client=#{client}, r3name=#{r3name}, username=#{username}, password=#{password}, pool_capacity=#{poolCapacity}, peak_limit=#{peakLimit}, language=#{language}, fg_use_user_lang=#{fgUseUserLang}, fg_use=#{fgUse}, mod_username=#{modUsername}, mod_date=#{modDate} where scr_seq=#{scrSeq}

select * from pltf_sap_conn_resource a where a.fg_delete='N' and name=#{name}

and ( upper(a.name) like '%'||upper(trim(#{query}))||'%' or upper(a.description) like '%'||upper(trim(#{query}))||'%' )
